The cuts will affect money allocated for sand erosive and replenishative projects. The budget will be voted on later this year.

articles.title: Rajshahi winters warming fast amid vanishing green, blue spaces
articles.author: Suzon Ali . Rajshahi
articles.summary: Rajshahi city's winter land-surface temperature has risen by 2.66C between 1990 and 2023, with some areas experiencing a rise of more than 4C. Over the 33-year period, the built-up area in the city increased by 28% and vegetated and water-covered areas decreased by 26% and 3%. The population in Rajshahi has grown at an annual rate of 2.88%.
